name: Great Wolf Paintbrush
description:
A VR experiment where I let you draw on images of the world to affect it.

Spells:

  1. Grow Tree (draw a tree, or something like a mushroom cloud, must be right-side-up)
  2. Teleport (draw a circle, start wherever, draw clockwise or counterclockwise)
  3. Slice (straight line, in any direction).
